column1: "It's loyalty or patronage to Trump that gets you at the top of the list, whether it's a place on the White House lawn to promote your business, input in the coronavirus response, ambassadorships, and even IG positions."
Trunt is psychic. Years ago, he tweeted about covfefe. Now we have Covid19. He now predicts a miracle. I hope he is right, and we get him under indictment where he belongs.
